author: David Fischer
title: Here Is Your First Look at the Helmut Lang x Travis Scott Capsule Collection & Every Retailer Where You Can Buy It Starting Tomorrow

text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
Just a few days ago news about Travis Scott having worked on a capsule collection with Helmut Lang have leaked. After having been one of the more prominent faces of the roll-out of the recent Supreme x Louis Vuitton collection in Paris, Scott continues to stay in the fashion spotlight with a capsule with the Helmut Lang brand. Today we can give you a first teaser look at some pieces from the collection, as well as a full retailer list of who will be carrying the line. Apparently the Travis Scott x Helmut Lang collection will launch on January 30, opening New York Fashion Week with a bang. 
Here above you see some shorts and jackets from the collection, but the rapper has in the meantime also presented t-shirts and even sneakers on his Snapchat channel. It looks like they dominantly worked with the below bull graphic and the “Cowboy” slogan seen on the jackets though out the collection.
Helmut Lang X Travis Scott coming January 30. pic.twitter.com/uyYqrPaq1X 
— HELMUT LANG (@HELMUTLANG) January 26, 2017 

Helmut Lang X Travis Scott coming 1.30.17. Available in select stores worldwide. pic.twitter.com/9tXdFsdGze 
— HELMUT LANG (@HELMUTLANG) January 28, 2017
